message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DM, cs.SY, cs.RO. 

The paper discusses metrics for measuring the similarity of states in a finite Markov decision process (MDP) with an aim towards solving discounted infinite horizon reinforcement learning tasks. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-categories of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Machine Learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper also discusses the formulation of metrics based on the notion of bisimulation for MDPs, which is a topic related to Discrete Mathematics (cs.DM). The paper also mentions the use of these metrics to structure value function approximators, which is a topic related to Systems and Control (cs.SY) and Robotics (cs.RO).
